title: Chicken Burger /w Broccoli (low acid)
preparation: Combine first 4 ingredients in a food processor; process until finely ground. Shape chicken mixture into a 1/2-inch-thick patty. Heat a large grill pan over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add patty to pan; cook 3-5 minutes on each side.
Spread 1 tablespoon mayonnaise over bread. Top burger with 1 lettuce leaf, 1 patty, and 2 tomato slices. Spread 1 1/2 teaspoons mustard over top slice of bread, then top burgers.
